alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Licking; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 4:48PM EDT until April 21 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Delaware County in central Ohio... Northwestern Licking County in central Ohio... East central Union County in central Ohio... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 447 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Powell, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Dublin, Delaware, Powell, Sunbury, Ashley, Radnor, Shawnee Hills, Galena, Ostrander, Hartford, Interstate 71 at US Route 36/State Route 37, Alum Creek State Park, Delaware State Park, Olive Green, Stratford, Bellepoint, Warrensburg, Leonardsburg, State Route 229 at US Route 23 and Kilbourne. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 124 and 138. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
